## Set up

Importing our needed libraries. We use tidyverse for almost everything.

```{r}

#| label: setup   #<1>
#| message: false #<2>
#| warning: false #<3>

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

```

# Importing multiple files at once

```{r}
#| label: import-oyo

power_files_list <- list.files(
  "data-processed-power",
  full.names = T
)

power_files_list

```

```{r}
#| label: combine-files-oyo

power_all <- map(
  power_files_list,
  read_csv
) |>
  list_rbind() |>
  clean_names()

power_all |> glimpse()
```

#| lable: function
